snippet.title: Extremely Powerful Capybaras - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Extremely Powerful Capybaras is a chaotic survival roguelite game for 1-4 players! 

 
⚔️  Unlock weapons and skills
💀 Face hordes of enemies
♨️ Chill in hot springs with capy-friends


- Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2089980/Extremely_Powerful_Capybaras/
- Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/2yVvvEAAup
- Follow us on twitter, tiktok and instagram: @studiobravarda
